name: WorldMathematicsLeague
0:
”Alexa, open World Mathematics League”
”Alexa, ask World Mathematics League for yesterday scores”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: world mathematics league
des:
World Mathematics League is a global level mathematics competition. Every day you will get a chance to contribute to your team's score by solving simple math questions. You will have a fixed amount of time within which you can answer as many questions as possible. 

Based on your device location, you will be auto-enrolled into your national and regional teams and your individual score will be added to your overall team's score. The more members in your league, the better are your chances of winning. So, spread the word and recruit your friends. If you choose, not to share the location, you can still play the game but you won't be enrolled in any team.

Hint: You can look at the Home Screen of the Alexa app while you answer the questions to get a visual representation of questions.

You can say:

Repeat - To hear the question again
Rules - To hear the rules of the game
Rankings - To hear the rankings of the top scoring regions
Time - To know the time remaining
I don't know - To reveal the answer
